title.rendered: The WealthNet reports: Is this the UK’s biggest family office?

excerpt.rendered: Alvarium, the London-based investment advisory, merchant banking and co-investment boutique that has just recruited Nancy Curtin, the former chief investment office of Close Brothers Asset Management (CBAM), would certainly appear in the top-tier of any UK family/private office ranking.
